name: SHSignature
desc: An object that contains the opaque data and other information for a signature.

items.name: init(dataRepresentation: Data)
items.desc: Creates a signature object from raw data.

items.name: var dataRepresentation: Data
items.desc: The raw data for the signature.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration of the audio you use to generate the signature.
